input_schema.description: A single cat photo with its URL and optional metadata

title.description: An optional title or label for the photo

photographer.description: An optional credit to the photographer

input_schema.description: A single cat photo with its URL and optional metadata

url.description: The URL or file path to the cat photo image

title.description: An optional title or label for the photo

photographer.description: An optional credit to the photographer

description: Evaluates cat photographs and assigns a quality score between 0 and 1 based on technical excellence and visual clarity. Assesses sharpness and focus, lighting effectiveness, fine detail clarity, and color reproduction accuracy to identify photographs that combine technical mastery with compelling subject presentation.
